Welcome to edBlog!

Tags: Python, Django, WebDev, GitHub

Welcome to edBlog! This is my first of many posts I will be making here on edBlog. I plan to blog about my life, code, web stuff, and basically anything I find interesting.

edBlog is a simple blogging application I built for my own use. It is built using the django framework which is awesome by the way. Django is a web framework built in python. If you are interested go ahead and read more about it here.

I have recently gotten into web development in python/django and have been loving it. I am planning writing some useful little scripts and also developing some slightly larger applications for the web. Stay tuned here for updates and also don’t forget to “fork” me over at my github.

I think that is all for now thanks for reading.

Built by Eddie Hedges
